Our science and technology enhance society's well-being and create critical innovations that drive scientific advances for the future. We conduct groundbreaking research and development, design and manufacture leading-edge products, and deliver critical services for commercial and government customers. Our work meets the needs of the nation when it matters most, and Battelle is committed to driving innovation today and for generations to come.\xa0", 'The Medical Device Solutions group is hired by external companies from startups to Fortune 100 to assist them with their product development needs. Clients choose to work with us because of a proven track record for developing innovative and marketable solutions to challenging technical problems. The Software Engineer will be an integral part of the multi-disciplinary teams that we form around each project. A large focus for the group is on medical device development. This has included projects for mass produced drug delivery devices, immunodiagnostic systems, surgery tools, large scale imaging systems, and more. Regardless of whether the device is in the user’s hands or part of a larger system of care, they all are driven by the same ambition - to positively affect the user’s health outcome.', 'Experience in an interdisciplinary product development environment.', 'Experience in C#, Python, Java, and/or C++ for Windows environments. Other relevant languages and development environments may be considered.', 'Signal Processing code / Algorithms', 'Demonstrable skills for use of structured methodologies and processes such as Agile or Agile-like software estimation and development tools and techniques.', ' Demonstrable skills for use of structured methodologies and processes such as Agile or Agile-like software estimation and development tools and techniques. Security architecture and systems engineering experience as demonstrated by specifying, designing, and developing secure software and hardware systems. Experience with automated software testing tools. Experience in software development compliant to FDA standards and guidance documents.\xa0 Experience in developing software/firmware for:  Wireless connectivity including familiarity with protocols such as Bluetooth, Bluetooth Low Energy, or Zigbee User interfaces (e.g. displays, switches, etc.) Device drivers Signal Processing code / Algorithms   Experience using electronics laboratory equipment for testing and debugging activities (oscilloscope, logic analyzer, multi-meter, etc).', 'LEGAL DISCLAIMER', 'Experience using electronics laboratory equipment for testing and debugging activities (oscilloscope, logic analyzer, multi-meter, etc).', 'Battelle’s competitive benefits program includes comprehensive medical and dental care, matching 401K, paid time off, flexible spending accounts, disability coverage, and other benefits that help provide financial protection for you and your family.', 'Battelle provides employment and opportunities for advancement, compensation, training, and growth according to individual merit, without regard to race, color, religion, sex (including pregnancy), national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, marital status, age, genetic information, disability, veteran-status, or any other characteristic protected under applicable Federal, state, or local law.\xa0Our goal is for each staff member to have the opportunity to grow to the limits of their abilities and to achieve personal and organizational objectives. We will support positive programs for equal treatment of all staff and full utilization of all qualified employees at all levels within Battelle.', 'We are currently seeking a Software Engineer II. This position located in Columbus, Ohio.', 'JOB SUMMARY', 'Security architecture and systems engineering experience as demonstrated by specifying, designing, and developing secure software and hardware systems.', ' Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related discipline AND 2+ years of relevant experience. Experience in an interdisciplinary product development environment. Experience in C#, Python, Java, and/or C++ for Windows environments. Other relevant languages and development environments may be considered. Candidate must be self-motivated, organized, and a problem solver who works well within a team. US citizen or permanent residency is required.', 'Wireless connectivity including familiarity with protocols such as Bluetooth, Bluetooth Low Energy, or Zigbee', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related discipline AND 2+ years of relevant experience.']

', " In this era of COVID-19, we believe in putting our employees first and keeping them safe. ['', 'Execute and drive the development on the frontend', 'A plus to have:', 'As a UI Engineer with DVx Ventures, you’ll:', 'Regularly work with and communicate with other engineers, team leads, and executives', '4+ plus years of hands-on, frontend software engineering experience', 'Experience working in the entire product lifecycle of growth and revenue: build from scratch, growth, and scale', 'Experience leading the frontend development on a B2C product\xa0Experience working in the entire product lifecycle of growth and revenue: build from scratch, growth, and scale', 'We’re seeking a Senior UI/React Engineer to partner with us on our DVx Software Development Team. Led by entrepreneurs, we drive the entire start-up execution process from concept development to build to team formation, investment, launch, and scale. Our ideas come from years of experience executing against addressable gaps in the market and our founders bring experience from key roles in growing Tesla, Lululemon, Lyft, eBay, Google, BCG, and Symantec. ['', 'What We’re Doing', 'An interest in using the best tool for the job. Our current favorites are React (and React Native), Python, Kafka, Postgres, and gRPC.', 'Doctor on Cal', 'Life At Oscar', 'Pay Transparency Policy', 'Experience understanding our problems and user requirements and translating them into solutions.', 'Grow the team by attracting, onboarding, and coaching new/junior engineers.', 'Knowledge Management', 'Work with partners, product managers, and designers to solve challenging problems.', 'Cost Estimates', 'Component Library', 'About This Role', 'Knowledge Management – Our Concierge Care Guides field thousands of questions every day from our members, ranging from payments to benefits to help with finding a doctor. They essentially have to become experts on everything. We’re creating a platform that automatically surfaces relevant answers based on the member’s inquiries, ensuring the content is specific to the member and their plan and demographics.Component Library – Part of what makes Oscar stand out is having visually appealing and easy to understand user experiences. We’ve designed and built a React component library that’s branded and web accessible. Every web application at Oscar, whether external or internal, uses the component library. Read more about it here.', 'Implement step-wise technical migrations of our existing applications.', 'Broker Platform ', 'Cost Estimates – One of the biggest issues for members is price transparency. It’s difficult to find out how much something in healthcare will cost beforehand. in a different location can result in a difference in costs. We’re building a cost estimates tool for members so they can get accurate price estimates for the service they’re planning on receiving. This will help our members make informed decisions and avoid surprise medical bills.', 'Doctor on Call – Whenever possible, we want members to start their care with us. Central to this experience is Doctor on Call: unlimited, 24/7 access to a doctor that’s completely free for most members and accessible directly in the website or mobile app. We’re able to resolve around two-thirds of all requests, often averting a more expensive trip to the emergency room or urgent care.Appointment Scheduling – Finding a doctor and scheduling an appointment shouldn’t require calling up every doctor in the directory. We’ve partnered with select doctors to reserve appointment slots for Oscar members, and it’s just a few clicks for our members to find the right doctor, view their availabilities, and immediately book an appointment.Cost Estimates – One of the biggest issues for members is price transparency. It’s difficult to find out how much something in healthcare will cost beforehand. in a different location can result in a difference in costs. We’re building a cost estimates tool for members so they can get accurate price estimates for the service they’re planning on receiving. This will help our members make informed decisions and avoid surprise medical bills.', '5+ years of professional software engineering experience.', 'Lead the planning, execution and release of complex technical projects.', 'An eagerness to collaborate with other engineers, product managers, designers, and operational partners across Oscar. We believe the best ideas emerge when people share different perspectives and work together.', 'Responsibilities', 'Appointment Scheduling', 'Reasonable Accommodation', "Become the expert on your team's business and technical domains.Lead the planning, execution and release of complex technical projects.Work with partners, product managers, and designers to solve challenging problems.Work with other engineers on the team to improve technology and apply best practices.Implement step-wise technical migrations of our existing applications.Grow the team by attracting, onboarding, and coaching new/junior engineers.", 'Work with other engineers on the team to improve technology and apply best practices.', 'Knowledge Management – Our Concierge Care Guides field thousands of questions every day from our members, ranging from payments to benefits to help with finding a doctor. They essentially have to become experts on everything. We’re creating a platform that automatically surfaces relevant answers based on the member’s inquiries, ensuring the content is specific to the member and their plan and demographics.', 'The ability to architect creative and maintainable applications across our web and mobile clients. We seek the right balance between moving quickly and improving the operability, performance, and scalability of the systems we build.', '5+ years of professional software engineering experience.A passion for fixing healthcare. The current healthcare experience is broken: it’s expensive, confusing, and doesn’t focus enough on patient outcomes. Our goal is to refactor healthcare piece by piece.An eagerness to collaborate with other engineers, product managers, designers, and operational partners across Oscar. We believe the best ideas emerge when people share different perspectives and work together.Experience understanding our problems and user requirements and translating them into solutions.The ability to architect creative and maintainable applications across our web and mobile clients. We seek the right balance between moving quickly and improving the operability, performance, and scalability of the systems we build.An interest in using the best tool for the job. Our current favorites are React (and React Native), Python, Kafka, Postgres, and gRPC.', 'Requirements', 'A passion for fixing healthcare. The current healthcare experience is broken: it’s expensive, confusing, and doesn’t focus enough on patient outcomes. Our goal is to refactor healthcare piece by piece.', 'Appointment Scheduling – Finding a doctor and scheduling an appointment shouldn’t require calling up every doctor in the directory. We’ve partnered with select doctors to reserve appointment slots for Oscar members, and it’s just a few clicks for our members to find the right doctor, view their availabilities, and immediately book an appointment.', 'Doctor on Call – Whenever possible, we want members to start their care with us. Central to this experience is Doctor on Call: unlimited, 24/7 access to a doctor that’s completely free for most members and accessible directly in the website or mobile app. We’re able to resolve around two-thirds of all requests, often averting a more expensive trip to the emergency room or urgent care.', "Become the expert on your team's business and technical domains.", 'Component Library – Part of what makes Oscar stand out is having visually appealing and easy to understand user experiences. We’ve designed and built a React component library that’s branded and web accessible. Every web application at Oscar, whether external or internal, uses the component library. Read more about it here.']

', " You will have significant influence over the vision, features and design of zulily's data platform and services.", ' Working knowledge of challenges and various solutions in handling large data volume, whether in terms of complex SQL queries and stored procedures, or brute-force caching, or paradigms of parallel processing. Able to find creative solutions and move quickly to deliver them. Strong ability to collaborate with team members throughout the process and consult with other project teams on the design and use of enterprise data. Excellent written and oral communication skills and a desire to educate co-workers and business users about our data and how to access it.Preferred Qualifications  Cloud technologies experience/knowledge is a plus (GCP, AWS, Azure)   Thrives in a fast-paced, evolving, growing and dynamic environment.   Ability to work with and influence others.   Can think system-wide and translate business requirements into code. Proficient analytical skills with a data driven approach and ability to measure impact of project.   Willingness to explore new ideas and have a passion to make them happen.   Embrace an environment that supports innovation and process improvement. Education Bachelor’s Degree required in CS, Information Technology or Engineering related field. Master’s Degree preferred. 4+ years experience in development, programming or architecture.', " Work with stakeholders to understand their information needs and translate these into business functional and technical requirements and solutions. You will have significant influence over the vision, features and design of zulily's data platform and services. You will be responsible for choosing tools, languages, building the platform, methodology for building data services and datasets. Design and develop the infrastructure required for optimal extraction, transformation, and loading of data from a wide variety of data sources using SQL and GCP ‘big data’ technologies. You will develop a set of standard, guidelines, best practices and documentation for your fellow engineers.  Analyze complex data systems and document data elements, data flow, relationships and dependencies to contribute to conceptual, logical and physical data models. Design, build and deploy efficient & reliable data pipelines to assemble large, complex datasets that meet business requirements. Ensure data quality and data governance, create/maintain data dictionary and related metadata. Collaborate in the planning, design, development, test, and deployment of new BI solutions. Provide production support for new and existing BI solutions. Handle data-related technical issues and support our internal customers with their data infrastructure needs. Disseminate knowledge across the team.Qualifications Ability to understand and effectively communicate at both a business and technical level. 4+ years experience in database development, reporting, and analytics with an advanced working SQL knowledge. Experience and ability to demonstrate proficiency in writing moderate to complex SQL queries ( e.g. Hive, RDBMS, SparkQL. etc.)  4+ years experience in object oriented/functional programming languages in Java or Python Experience and working knowledge in “big-data” technologies particularly systems like Hive, BigQuery, Redshift, Spark, etc. Building and optimizing 'big data' data pipelines, architectures and datasets. Experience in designing and deploying production supported dimensional models, star schemas, and/or data marts.  Professional history working in a Unix environment with scripting languages like bash. Working knowledge of challenges and various solutions in handling large data volume, whether in terms of complex SQL queries and stored procedures, or brute-force caching, or paradigms of parallel processing. Able to find creative solutions and move quickly to deliver them. Strong ability to collaborate with team members throughout the process and consult with other project teams on the design and use of enterprise data. ['', 'Awareness of the layers involved in full-stack development.', 'At Puppet, engineers on feature delivery teams collaborate closely with tech leads and members of the product and user experience teams to determine what we build and how we build it. Our team works in an agile, iterative fashion, breaking up large ideas into small, concrete chunks that can be implemented quickly to deliver value or further learning. We work collectively, allowing us to accomplish far more as a\xa0team than could be accomplished individually.', 'You have:', 'Curious', 'As the industry leader in DevOps solutions, we realize that our success is a collective effort; all made possible by the incredible people working here, our customers, partners, and Puppet community. Our culture is built on positivity, diversity, inclusivity and support—and we seek people who are resilient, entrepreneurial-minded, team players who continually strive to be incrementally better every single day. In our work together we aim to be curious, accountable, empathetic and, above all, collaborative. If this sounds like the environment you’d thrive in, why not say hello?', 'Expertise in scaling applications to make them as fast and efficient as possible', 'A team player', 'Please note, this position is not eligible for visa sponsorship.', 'Developed complex web applications with a modern application framework such as React, Ember, Angular, or equivalent frameworks.Broad technical experience and up-to-date industry knowledge, with ability to evaluate new solutions as they ariseExpertise in scaling applications to make them as fast and efficient as possibleAppreciation for high quality software and value writing tests and using testing frameworks to improve code qualityAwareness of the layers involved in full-stack development.Interest in implementing security best practices.', '\ufeff*Visa Sponsorship', 'I’m seeking a\xa0Frontend/Full Stack\xa0Software Engineer\xa0to join our team in helping us build Puppet Enterprise, a market-leading configuration management solution. We’re a cross-functional team focused on delivering user-facing features, contributing primarily to the on-premise web application component of Puppet Enterprise that our customers use to view and manage change across their infrastructure. Our work directly impacts the user experience of our software and we keep the customer in mind at all times when developing features.', 'Software Engineer\xa0', 'About Puppet', 'Be on the forefront for the development of the next generation of capabilities that will enable our customers to meet their automation demands while taking Puppet to the next level.', 'Passionate', "Please see Puppet's privacy policy here.", 'You are:', 'Developed complex web applications with a modern application framework such as React, Ember, Angular, or equivalent frameworks.', 'Appreciation for high quality software and value writing tests and using testing frameworks to improve code quality', 'If you are an individual with a disability and require a reasonable accommodation to complete any part of the application process, or are limited in the ability or unable to access or use this online application process and need an alternative method for applying, you may contact +1-877-575-9775 for assistance.', 'Broad technical experience and up-to-date industry knowledge, with ability to evaluate new solutions as they arise', '\xa0', 'Passionate—with a love for solving user problems with software.\xa0', 'Interest in implementing security best practices.', 'Design, build, and test new functionality, using React for the front-end app, Go and Java (and maybe some Clojure) for the middleware and services, and Ruby for some of the tests.Share knowledge with other developers at Puppet through pairing,\xa0code reviews, hack days, and company-wide demos.Mentor peers through their professional development.Be on the forefront for the development of the next generation of capabilities that will enable our customers to meet their automation demands while taking Puppet to the next level.', 'Curious—with a drive to learn and understand.', 'We are hiring at various experience levels and we’re particularly interested in having a diverse team with a broad set of skills and viewpoints. If this seems like your dream job, but you’re not sure if you qualify, apply anyway!', 'Frontend/Full Stack', 'Passionate—with a love for solving user problems with software.\xa0A team player—who is collaborative and enjoys learning from and sharing knowledge with other developers in a team environment.Curious—with a drive to learn and understand.', 'AJ Johnson, Sr. Director of Engineering', 'Mentor peers through their professional development.', 'You will:', 'Learn more about Puppet by checking out the values we live by and the awesome benefits and perks we offer employees!', 'Design, build, and test new functionality, using React for the front-end app, Go and Java (and maybe some Clojure) for the middleware and services, and Ruby for some of the tests.', 'Puppet’s core mission is to eliminate soul crushing work. We created the industry standard for managing infrastructure as code. And we didn’t stop there—our product portfolio has grown to help organizations automate across their entire software delivery lifecycle. With more than two-thirds of Fortune 100 companies using Puppet’s open source or commercial products, our code is helping power thousands of organizations across the world.', 'Share knowledge with other developers at Puppet through pairing,\xa0code reviews, hack days, and company-wide demos.', 'Puppet is an equal opportunity employer and considers qualified applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, creed, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, marital status, national origin, ancestry, age, veteran status, disability, or any other protected class.', 'A team player—who is collaborative and enjoys learning from and sharing knowledge with other developers in a team environment.', 'Hi, I’m\xa0AJ Johnson, Sr. Director of Engineering\xa0at Puppet,']

['', 'Key Responsibilities', 'Senior candidates must demonstrate a track record of successful technical leadership in the execution of large-scale data projects.\xa0', 'Nice to have:', 'Provide tooling and automation for infrastructure, continuous testing, and continuous deploy of data systems\xa0', 'Experience with establishing well-organized data lakes\xa0', 'Design and implement scalable data workflows and pipelines, and integrate diverse data sources and sinks\xa0', 'Experience with AWS data stack – Redshift, Athena, EMR, Kinesis, DocumentDB, DynamoDB\xa0Experience with establishing well-organized data lakes\xa0Experience setting up and optimizing data warehouses\xa0Background in data modeling and performance tuning in relational and no-SQL databases\xa0Experience with data practices (security, data management and governance)\xa0Experience in operations research, machine learning or optimization', 'Work with the platform operations team to monitor and maintain live production systems\xa0', 'As part of the Avail Data Engineering team, you will be working to manage our ever-growing collection of vehicle sharing and usage data. We support our business analytics and marketing teams by performing data integration and ETL between an increasingly diverse set of data sources and our data warehouse. We will also build big-data applications leveraging techniques from operations research and machine learning to directly enrich, personalize and optimize the Avail car-sharing product. This is a green field opportunity to contribute to the design and implementation of a flexible, scalable data framework for an exciting new sector of the sharing economy.\xa0This position can be based in either of two Avail HQ offices at San Francisco or Chicago, or fully remote with semi-regular travel to SF HQ.\xa0', 'Ability to thrive in a fast paced, cross regional, diverse, and dynamic work environment\xa0', 'Avail is a new peer-to-peer car sharing services. There are currently 3 lines of business. Avail at Airport is a car sharing service that connects local travelers who own cars with travelers who need to borrow a car. Avail at Apartments is a new soon to be launched business that provides car sharing within their Apartment community. The third line of business is being designed but would be equally disruptive.', 'Big Data Engineering – Experience in building scalable data pipelines involving machine learning, optimization or prediction\xa0', '\xa0', 'Design appropriate database schemas and optimize database deployment architectures for analytics query loads\xa0', 'Nice to have:\xa0', 'Implement data transforms and organization for various data stores (data lakes and warehouses)\xa0', 'Software Engineering – Level-appropriate experience in software engineering and SDLC (our stack may include Python, Golang and Scala). Must consider code readability, reuse, and extensibility a priority when developing solutions.\xa0', 'Background in data modeling and performance tuning in relational and no-SQL databases\xa0', 'Various experience levels considered. Junior candidates must have a strong background of coursework or academic projects around data engineering or machine learning at scale or have appropriate industry experience contributing to such projects.\xa0Senior candidates must demonstrate a track record of successful technical leadership in the execution of large-scale data projects.\xa0Software Engineering – Level-appropriate experience in software engineering and SDLC (our stack may include Python, Golang and Scala). Must consider code readability, reuse, and extensibility a priority when developing solutions.\xa0Big Data Engineering – Experience in building scalable data pipelines involving machine learning, optimization or prediction\xa0Big Data Devops – Experience in performing operations and automation of various big-data ecosystems in production environments on AWS or a related cloud service\xa0Ability to thrive in a fast paced, cross regional, diverse, and dynamic work environment\xa0', 'Experience with AWS data stack – Redshift, Athena, EMR, Kinesis, DocumentDB, DynamoDB\xa0', 'Design and implement scalable data workflows and pipelines, and integrate diverse data sources and sinks\xa0Design appropriate database schemas and optimize database deployment architectures for analytics query loads\xa0Implement data transforms and organization for various data stores (data lakes and warehouses)\xa0Design and implement new platform architectures for building and serving machine learning models\xa0Work with the platform operations team to monitor and maintain live production systems\xa0Provide tooling and automation for infrastructure, continuous testing, and continuous deploy of data systems\xa0', 'Design and implement new platform architectures for building and serving machine learning models\xa0', 'Big Data Devops – Experience in performing operations and automation of various big-data ecosystems in production environments on AWS or a related cloud service\xa0', 'Various experience levels considered. Junior candidates must have a strong background of coursework or academic projects around data engineering or machine learning at scale or have appropriate industry experience contributing to such projects.\xa0', 'Experience setting up and optimizing data warehouses\xa0', 'Requirements:\xa0', 'Experience in operations research, machine learning or optimization', 'Experience with data practices (security, data management and governance)\xa0']

['', '  Cluster computing and containerization (Docker, Kubernetes, Calico, Istio, etc.)', '  Solid hands-on technical knowledge of C++ and Java, Scala, or Python', '  Passion for new technologies', '  A desire to build robust, scalable, and maintainable systems', 'Bloomberg is an equal opportunities employer, and we value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.', '  Passion for solving difficult problems ', '  Experience with the Apache Hadoop Ecosystem (Spark, HDFS, Kafka, HBase, etc.)', "In Bloomberg Vault, you'll help us build large scale data processing and reporting systems that ingest, surveil, index and provide applications that package and deliver complex events streams spanning communication, collaboration, and financial transaction data. ", "You've seen the headlines. Financial firms are fined millions of dollars when just one employee does something they shouldn't. It can be as serious as insider trading or as seemingly innocent as an inappropriate instant message. Keeping track of who is saying, doing, and trading what is a daunting task for compliance officers, especially with the explosion in the volume and variety of data produced by communications and trading platforms.", "The Vault Data Access team is responsible for a suite of services that provide access to the data in the Vault archive. Our consumers are both client-facing applications and firms that subscribe to daily communications extracts. Delivery of these extracts is critical --- without them clients legally can't use the terminal that day! While maintaining and enhancing our existing system, we're currently building a new data processing pipeline using Scala and Apache Spark. Over the next year we will work to port our existing pipelines to this new platform. This is a hands-on technically challenging role, balancing understanding of complex existing systems with build-out of new strategic services, and backend processing with client-facing API's.", "That's where Bloomberg Vault comes in. We are comprised of Bloomberg Vault Archive and Bloomberg Surveillance to provide a single platform for more than 1,000 organizations customers. Our clients use Bloomberg Vault to manage and archive their enterprise communications and collaboration data, including email, instant message (IM), mobile, files, trade and documents, voice data and social media. Our multi-tenant cloud processes 300 million messages daily and stores about 90 billion archived objects, and we are looking to grow significantly in the next two years.", '  A desire to build robust, scalable, and maintainable systems  Solid hands-on technical knowledge of C++ and Java, Scala, or Python  BA, BS, MS, PhD in Computer Science, Engineering or related technology field', '  Experience with the Apache Hadoop Ecosystem (Spark, HDFS, Kafka, HBase, etc.)  Cluster computing and containerization (Docker, Kubernetes, Calico, Istio, etc.)  Passion for new technologies  Passion for solving difficult problems ', '  BA, BS, MS, PhD in Computer Science, Engineering or related technology field']

['engineering', ' ', 'This position is remote.', 'MUD\\WTR is looking for a self-directed Software + Data Engineer with passion and experience for e-commerce to join our engineering squad comprised of a small + talented team led by CTO & Head of Product Jonathan Crawford, former Founder/CEO of Storenvy. From data insights to retention tactics, we pride ourselves on getting a lot done with a little team and creating hundreds of thousands of happy customers. As an engineer, you will be working closely with CTO, Product, Design, and Customer Support teams to collaboratively cultivate the evolution of our best-in-class digital product experience. This is not a standard engineering role as so much of the work involved is engineering\xa0ways to achieve our technical and product goals without directly writing code or hosting our own app. (Personally, I find it to be an extremely interesting technical challenge — Jonathan). Our headquarters is in Venice, CA but our team spans the globe with 90% of our team working remotely. Join us in our mission to improve human existence through what we put in our mug. ']

['JOB SUMMARY\xa0', 'The Senior Systems Engineer (SE) is primarily responsible for providing highest level of support (T3 technical expertise) to end users by handling service requests that have been escalated by lower tiers. Support will generally be provided, remotely, over the phone, or via email however some onsite work may be necessary. They will be required to develop solutions for complex network, desktop, and server problems. They will have the ability to analyze existing systems and make proactive recommendations for improvements. Develops, maintains, and implements all systems, applications, and networking configurations. The SE will also work to continuously advance personal and organizational technical abilities. As a senior team leader in the organization, the SE must be a champion of the company culture, leading by example hold them to the highest behavior standards.\xa0']

Will work remote from the local area initially. ***Quick OverviewAs a Senior Software Engineer (Backend) at BitTitan, you will work as part of a collaborative Agile Scrum team, with a focus on constant learning and improvement. We generally iterate in two-week sprints and make time for feedback after every sprint through team retrospectives. Our teams strive to be cross-functional, and there are opportunities to extend your impact into new areas from time to time rather than being required to stick only to a specific skillset. We appreciate engineers who have great ideas to share and the desire to help us on the path to making those ideas a reality.In This Job, You Will Design and implement high-quality and highly scalable code to enable processing of large volumes of data, e.g. customer records, migration watermarks or statistics  Troubleshoot issues escalated from the support team and provide a resolution within a timely manner  Review code changes requests to identify potential improvements and to prevent errors, before approving and releasing the code  Drive the design of major features within the engineering team, by leading design review meetings and ensuring that new features fit into the existing architecture  Work with the product management team to synchronize and ensure delivery, by helping organizing tasks within the team and coordinating work with other teams  Communicate, document and provide training to other engineers around the features delivered  Independent driver /owner of high impact features or initiatives. May work with a small team to drive the relevant outcomes.  Provide technical expertise to the team to propose and enable new initiatives such as new technologies, processes or improvements to the product  Mentor other engineers by providing technical guidance and constructive feedback  We would love to speak with you if you have:  Bachelor/Master’s degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, Engineering focus  8+ years of experience in software engineering  Strong, verifiable software development skills  High proficiency in at least one strongly typed object-oriented programming language (C#, Java, C++)  Experience using Git for version control  Deep knowledge of application design principles and design patterns  Desire to work together to define requirements, and refine based on feedback received over the course of multiple iterations  Ability and desire to bring ideas to the table and collaborate to solve problems  History of practicing and promoting good software development practices  Passion for learning and improvement, and a desire to share what you’ve learned with those around you Extras That Will Give You An Edge Experience working in a start-up environment\u202f  Email technology expertise (e.g. email routing, email migration, network protocols, DNS, etc.)\u202f\u202f \u202f  Experience with 1+ cloud platform (e.g. Azure, AWS, Google Cloud). Azure certification would be a plus  Experience in working with Microsoft technology stack including .NET, Azure DevOps, Power Shell scripting  Experience with cloud tools (Docker, Terraform, Chef, Ansible)  Knowledge of SQL database / query optimization Bring your experience, your talent, your creative energy, and meet a diverse group of people who work together and build software that aims for the cloud. We have a unique culture that is collaborative, customer centric, professional, and encourages hard work with a layer of fun that keeps us in balance. Join the team that makes a positive impact on the future of IT services automation… you’re going to love it!At BitTitan, Inc. we don’t just accept difference—we celebrate it, we support it, and we embrace it for the benefit of our employees, our partners, and our community. We are committed to equal employment opportunity and diversity.', 'Experience with cloud tools (Docker, Terraform, Chef, Ansible) ', 'Extras That Will Give You An Edge', 'Deep knowledge of application design principles and design patterns ', '8+ years of experience in software engineering ']

['', '5-7 years of experience with a modern programming language (Python preferred)', 'Organizational', 'Deep focus on detail and quality', 'This position will be a part of the Scientific Computing team and will interact with cross-disciplinary and multiple program teams.', 'BS or MS in Computer Science, engineering or relevant field', 'Design, build, test, ship, learn, repeat.\xa0We do science, and need software to support our mission. Sometimes it makes sense to buy and integrate with existing software and sometimes we need to build our own. You will work with the head of the Digital Sciences & Technology (DST) department and our software architect to break down milestones into tasks. You will work with a product manager to gather necessary data and requirements to design software solutions to those tasks and propose designs to DST leadership. You will build those software solutions, write automated tests, and ship your code. You will work with end-users to understand usage and iterate to make improvements.', 'Experience with DevOps infrastructure and configuration management automation (Chef, Puppet, SaltStack, Terraform)', 'Collaborate cross-functionally to learn from end-users and subject matter experts, develop requirements, and design software solutions.\xa0No silos here. You drive necessary conversations in order to dig into problems and determine possible solutions. You enjoy learning from others and supporting other teams such as data science and research scientists through your work. You enjoy harnessing the excitement of green field work, while balancing it with milestones and the need to iterate rapidly. You are eager to learn and help others, including our JV parents Bayer and Ginkgo Bioworks.\xa0Design, build, test, ship, learn, repeat.\xa0We do science, and need software to support our mission. You will build those software solutions, write automated tests, and ship your code. You will work with end-users to understand usage and iterate to make improvements.Participate in the product delivery life cycle.\xa0As a startup we need to iterate rapidly. You are excited to constantly learn and improve. You will be the voice of software engineering in product design discussions. You will participate in and proactively suggest improvements to our software and product delivery processes. You are self-directed and enjoy digging into problems as well as reaching out to other team members for feedback or insights as necessary. You enjoy working on projects from inception through delivery. ['But you’re able to work independently, heads-down at times, so a strong sense of ownership and accountability is key.\xa0', 'You’ll start with understanding our mission, what we’re trying to accomplish as a company, our culture and values which drive our work.\xa0You’ll dive deep into our tech stack, how our engineering, product, implementation and client success team’s function, to inform how you\xa0design, develop and maintain complex integrations with ERPs and accounting systems using web APIs and middleware technologies.\xa0\xa0You’ll work with our customers, collaborate internally across\xa0a TON of\xa0teams (product, customer support,\xa0devops,\xa0engineering, just to name a few) to deliver implementations\xa0and handle escalated support cases.\xa0Investigating and solving bugs, then releasing the fix to production is the norm.\xa0\xa0Once you’re comfortable with our stack and infrastructure, you’ll support planning, scoping, design and development of product features (quality and maintainability are key here)\xa0\xa0Critical R&D to help us continue to design for scale and reliability as we grow (and we’re growing)\xa0And grow! Both yourself and support the growth of others, spurring meaningful discussions around complex and technical issues.\xa0\xa0', 'All of\xa0VersaPay’s\xa0employees live out our core values:', 'Commitment - We are all-in. Both yourself and support the growth of others, spurring meaningful discussions around complex and technical issues.\xa0\xa0', 'You’re personable and approachable – after all, working across cross-functional teams, people will be looking to you for your expertise\xa0', 'Curiosity - We learn quickly. We ask why…a lot. We love inventing new and better ways\xa0\xa0', 'You don’t shy away from detective work and problem solving (even when the answer isn’t obvious); finding solutions to problems excite you\xa0and\xa0you’re\xa0comfortable\xa0with the unknown and ambiguous.\xa0', 'Honesty - We do what we say and say what we mean. We earn the trust that’s placed in us\xa0\xa0', 'Here’s how you’ll make a huge impact here – and on your career:', 'Critical R&D to help us continue to design for scale and reliability as we grow (and we’re growing)\xa0', 'Results - We get things done. We balance our curiosity with a drive to deliver\xa0\xa0\xa0', 'You’ll dive deep into our tech stack, how our engineering, product, implementation and client success team’s function, to inform how you\xa0design, develop and maintain complex integrations with ERPs and accounting systems using web APIs and middleware technologies.\xa0\xa0', '\xa0', 'You’ll start with understanding our mission, what we’re trying to accomplish as a company, our culture and values which drive our work.\xa0', 'Here’s how you’ll make a huge impact here – and on your career:\xa0', 'Once you’re comfortable with our stack and infrastructure, you’ll support planning, scoping, design and development of product features (quality and maintainability are key here)\xa0\xa0', 'You’ve got a couple years’ experience as a software developer, ideally a background in CS, engineering or mathematics\xa0', 'What you’ll bring to the team:\xa0\xa0', 'You’ve got a couple years’ experience as a software developer, ideally a background in CS, engineering or mathematics\xa0You’re got a strong knowledge of and familiar with/practice a variety of technologies like C#, Ruby on Rails, React/Node.js, SQL, REST/SOAP, JSON, XML, etc.\xa0You don’t shy away from detective work and problem solving (even when the answer isn’t obvious); finding solutions to problems excite you\xa0and\xa0you’re\xa0comfortable\xa0with the unknown and ambiguous.\xa0And you don’t shy away from solving our customers problems; that means jumping on calls, interacting\xa0with those that are directly using our product, to make sure they’re launched successful\xa0\xa0You’re savvy and nimble, quick to catch onto new tech and systems, juggling both the needs of our customers and our products and services.\xa0\xa0\xa0You’re personable and approachable – after all, working across cross-functional teams, people will be looking to you for your expertise\xa0But you’re able to work independently, heads-down at times, so a strong sense of ownership and accountability is key.\xa0You’re\xa0hyper detail-oriented\xa0and know the name of your grade 2 class-room goldfish;\xa0and juggling\xa0multiple tasks and priorities\xa0is second nature to you.\xa0', 'You’re got a strong knowledge of and familiar with/practice a variety of technologies like C#, Ruby on Rails, React/Node.js, SQL, REST/SOAP, JSON, XML, etc.\xa0', 'All of\xa0VersaPay’s\xa0employees live out our core values:\xa0\xa0', 'And you don’t shy away from solving our customers problems; that means jumping on calls, interacting\xa0with those that are directly using our product, to make sure they’re launched successful\xa0\xa0', 'You’ll work with our customers, collaborate internally across\xa0a TON of\xa0teams (product, customer support,\xa0devops,\xa0engineering, just to name a few) to deliver implementations\xa0and handle escalated support cases.\xa0Investigating and solving bugs, then releasing the fix to production is the norm.\xa0\xa0', 'You’re\xa0hyper detail-oriented\xa0and know the name of your grade 2 class-room goldfish;\xa0and juggling\xa0multiple tasks and priorities\xa0is second nature to you.\xa0', 'What you’ll bring to the team:\xa0', 'We’re looking to hire a new engineer to join our Integrations team! You’ll be developing and testing integrations, extending product features (working closely with\xa0our customers) throughout the implementation process.\xa0So\xa0you’ll get diverse exposure across a ton of diff.\xa0industries where we’re launching ARC\xa0(Accounts Receivable Cloud)\xa0and leading a\xa0fundamentally\xa0new way to manage AR\xa0by putting the customer at the center of everything they do.\xa0In this new era, customers are more demanding than ever before and expect an online experience that is quick, flexible, easy and secure.\xa0Our team’s known for their expertise in launching new customers and owning the end-to-end implementation of the ARC platform. That’s where you come in to help them launch successfully and use our product to its fullest potential.\xa0\xa0\xa0', 'You’re savvy and nimble, quick to catch onto new tech and systems, juggling both the needs of our customers and our products and services.\xa0\xa0\xa0']

['Experience with or interest in networking, including wireless communications and software defined networks. ', 'Stratospheric Mesh Network Coverage', 'Stratospheric Mesh Network Coverage:\xa0 ', 'We’re looking for a Backend Software Engineer to help us develop new SDN features, identify scaling bottlenecks, and improve the scalability and robustness of the infrastructure. In this role, you’ll develop new algorithms to better optimize the capacity and availability of our fleet of stratospheric balloons, ground stations, and terrestrial network nodes, as well as fleets of satellites operated by our partners. ', 'Minimum Qualifications ', 'Overview', 'Overview ', 'Experience with or interest in aerospace systems including communications satellites & stratospheric vehicles.', 'Understanding of software performance from a first-principles perspective. Experience optimizing concurrent software, database interactions, distributed state synchronization. Experience with or interest in networking, including wireless communications and software defined networks. Experience with or interest in building cloud-native software-as-a-service. Experience with or interest in solvers for mathematical optimization, and/or infrastructure for training & serving ML models. Experience with or interest in aerospace systems including communications satellites & stratospheric vehicles.', 'Loon’s Temporospatial Software Defined Network (TS-SDN) is designed to operate aerospace networks with complex, time-dynamic physical topologies. It’s purpose-built to control and orchestrate networks based on the location and orientation of assets, the relationships between those assets and their constraints, and the quality of wireless communications as assets move through space and time. Loon uses this infrastructure to directly control its mesh & backhaul network; it tasks gimbals and radios to optimize and enact the wireless network topology and radio resource plan in conjunction with the network routing, which it realizes by programming a forwarding fabric that spans satellites, balloons, ground stations, and terrestrial routers. ', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or a related field ', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or a related field Fluency in one of {C++, Go, Java}, with interest in developing proficiency in all three. Experience designing large scale systems and implementing core components. Basic knowledge of computer networks and/or wireless communications ', 'Basic knowledge of computer networks and/or wireless communications ', 'Experience with or interest in solvers for mathematical optimization, and/or infrastructure for training & serving ML models. ', 'About Loon', 'About Loon ', 'Design and implement APIs used by Loon and external partners to orchestrate network connectivity Develop and deploy new TS-SDN features and capabilities Profile performance, identify scaling bottlenecks and optimize / redesign components to clear them Improve the robustness and reliability of the infrastructure Collaborate with both internal and external technical customers on their specific needs to achieve our mission to Connect People Everywhere. ', 'Experience designing large scale systems and implementing core components. ', 'Collaborate with both internal and external technical customers on their specific needs to achieve our mission to Connect People Everywhere. ', 'Profile performance, identify scaling bottlenecks and optimize / redesign components to clear them ', 'Experience with or interest in building cloud-native software-as-a-service. ', 'Design and implement APIs used by Loon and external partners to orchestrate network connectivity ', 'Preferred Qualifications ', 'Develop and deploy new TS-SDN features and capabilities ', 'Responsibilities', 'Improve the robustness and reliability of the infrastructure ', 'Loon is on a mission to connect people everywhere by inventing and integrating audacious technology. Loon is built on a sophisticated system of products and services that combine advancements in materials science, atmospheric modeling, machine learning, and communications systems. These platforms enable Loon to harness the stratosphere, transforming global connectivity and creating endless possibilities for new applications by bridging ground, sky and space. ', 'For a taste of the groundbreaking solutions we’re building, see this recent article at The Verge covering Loon’s partnership with Telesat to manage network connections for their forthcoming LEO satellite constellation and this coverage of our stratospheric mesh network aiding with connectivity after a recent earthquake in Peru. ', 'Responsibilities\xa0 ', 'Fluency in one of {C++, Go, Java}, with interest in developing proficiency in all three. ', 'The Verge Article', 'https://spectrum.ieee.org/tech-talk/telecom/wireless/loons-balloons-deliver-emergency-service-to-peru-following-80-earthquake ', 'Experience optimizing concurrent software, database interactions, distributed state synchronization. We also have an annual company offsite, Shark Week, to get quality in-person time with the entire company at least once a year. We also allow employees to outfit their workstations to meet their needs—whether remote or in office. We value diversity and inclusivity. In a program sponsored by Price Waterhouse, PNC Bank and Marsh, Iris has been honored for being', 'In a competitive industry, we distinguish ourselves by reliability, technical expertise and a history of successfully completed projects for clients ranging from mid-sized to Fortune 1000 companies', 'Knowledge of following AWS services a must – S3, lambda, RedShift, Rds/Aurora and messaging/streaming services like kinesis, Kafka or similar\xa0(does not have to be all...can be Kinesis or Kafka for example)', "- One of New Jersey's Finest 25 companies for the year 2001 and 2002.", 'Big Plus:', 'Location: 100% Remote', 'Expert in Big Data solution development based on AWS services from scratch', 'Core skills:', "Iris's client,\xa0a large\xa0Financial Services organization,\xa0is currently searching for AWS BigData Developer to join their team for Remote.", 'Duration: Contract to hire| W2 only', '- NJ Technology FAST 50 Company for year 2002.', '- Iris is also ranked 75th among Inc 500 s list of privately held companies for year 2001.']

We work hard to help people stay connected by offering a solution that makes phone service free. At\xa0TextNow, we work\xa0together to solve complex and interesting problems that have a positive impact on our customers lives.\xa0', 'Create libraries and tooling that make distributed computation simple and accessible for users within TextNow.', 'Creator of cool shit\xa0that will be instrumental in building a modern data platform that is used for multiple internal use cases e.g., monetization, personalization, finance, data science, data engineering, user acquisition.', 'Employee Stock Options\xa0', 'Explore available technologies and design solutions to continuously improve our data quality, workflow reliability, and scalability. Perform capacity planning and cost estimates of proposed solutions.\xa0', 'Respectfully candid with the ability to\xa0initiate and drive\xa0projects to completion with minimal guidance. Highly organized, structured work approach and dependable. Expected ability to manage and communicate data warehouse plans to internal partners.', 'Unlimited vacation\xa0', 'Benefits:\xa0', 'Be an expert on open source big data technologies e.g., Spark, Hadoop, Iceberg, Presto, etc.', 'Brilliant, but not a jerk with\xa0at least\xa05+ years of experience in data engineering and/or data infrastructure.', 'Join us\xa0in our mission to\xa0help people\xa0stay connected with technology\xa0that is free\xa0(or as close to free as possible.)\xa0', 'Candidates from North America (US and Canada) are strongly preferred.', 'Create libraries and tooling that make distributed computation simple and accessible for users within TextNow.Develop tools to monitor, debug, and analyze data pipelines to ensure data quality and reliability.Troubleshoot data issues and build customized reports to investigate key business questions.\xa0Explore available technologies and design solutions to continuously improve our data quality, workflow reliability, and scalability. You’ll be a central figure in determining the design, architecture and performance of TextNow’s\xa0data platform, which helps power a service used by over 200M people. You will lead cross functional efforts with SRE, product, backend engineering and data science to understand where to insert the right big data technology. This is a senior-level position and accordingly, you’re expected to be a technology thought leader throughout the org.', 'Resourceful and scrappy with\xa0a keen eye on ROI -- knowledge of ad serving platforms and online advertising systems is a plus.', 'DIVERSITY AND INCLUSION:\xa0', 'Creator of cool shit\xa0that will be instrumental in building a modern data platform that is used for multiple internal use cases e.g., monetization, personalization, finance, data science, data engineering, user acquisition.Brilliant, but not a jerk with\xa0at least\xa05+ years of experience in data engineering and/or data infrastructure.Someone who takes action and ownership with\xa0years of hands-on experience of spinning up and maintaining data infrastructure in AWS, GCP or equivalent.Respectfully candid with the ability to\xa0initiate and drive\xa0projects to completion with minimal guidance. Highly organized, structured work approach and dependable. Expected ability to manage and communicate data warehouse plans to internal partners.A bold risk-taker and self-starter who\xa0proactively sees areas of improvement and drives the change the needed to make it happen.Resourceful and scrappy with\xa0a keen eye on ROI -- knowledge of ad serving platforms and online advertising systems is a plus.', 'At\xa0TextNow, our mission is built around inclusion and offering a service for EVERYONE, in an industry that traditionally only caters to the few who have the means to afford it. We believe that diversity of thought and inclusion of others promotes a greater feeling of belonging and higher levels of engagement. We know that if we work together, we can do amazing things, and that our differences are what make our product and company great.\xa0', 'Develop tools to monitor, debug, and analyze data pipelines to ensure data quality and reliability.', 'Competitive pay and benefits', 'Parental leave\xa0top\xa0up\xa0', 'Who You Are:', 'Be a champion of TextNow’s data ecosystem by working with engineering and SRE to guide data strategy for governance, security, privacy, quality and retention that will satisfy business policies and requirements.\xa0', 'A bold risk-taker and self-starter who\xa0proactively sees areas of improvement and drives the change the needed to make it happen.']

['', 'Product development teams follow the principles from the Scrum Guide. We’re practical about process (we use what works), but we’ve found Scrum ceremonies to be a positive framework for transparency and collaboration. To save time, we keep Sprint Plannings to 1 hour and Sprint Reviews to 45 minutes for our two-week sprints.', 'At Fictiv, we help product innovators to create. Fictiv brings a modern, friendly experience to manufacturing that makes it easy to turn designs into real products. You will use the latest technologies (React, Redux, Apollo GraphQL) to iterate quickly and ensure a rapid feedback loop between us and our customers.', 'We encourage applications from members of underrepresented groups, including but not limited to women, members of the LGBTQ community, people of color, people with disabilities, and veterans.', 'Deliver quality – You have a high attention to detail and hold both yourself and your colleagues accountable for shipping polished, well-tested code.', 'What It’s Like to Work at Fictiv ', 'Bring out the best in the team – You use influence and knowledge to lift the team to high standards of excellence not only in application design and code quality but also in collaboration and development practices.', 'Investment in Health & Wellness (we offer everything from virtual vinyasa to pilates classes)Access to professional development & coaching with additional free membership with Udemy, offering virtual learning via access to 4,000 coursesEqual maternity & paternity leaveErgonomic investment in your personal/home office while working virtuallyInvestment in Diversity & Inclusion (executive-sponsored D&I programs)Community days where you contribute to your community and enrich both yourself and organizations of your choice. Each year, you can use up to two days as community days.Happy hours and demo days to showcase what you’re working on and AMA’s from the Executive team!', 'Investment in Diversity & Inclusion (executive-sponsored D&I programs)', 'We support a community that includes some of the most talented people on the planet. You’ll design for hardware engineers who are literally building the future today (think autonomous vehicles, spaceships, next-gen medical devices) and partner with some of the most skilled manufacturers who produce the seemingly impossible.', 'We strive to contribute to the well-being of our team beyond Health (of which we pay 85% per employee and 60% for dependents which an increase in contribution in January), Dental and Vision insurance.', 'We’re actively seeking potential teammates who can bring diverse perspectives and experience to our culture and company. We believe inclusion is the best way to create a strong, empathetic team. Our belief is that the best team is born from an environment that emphasizes respect, honesty, collaboration, and growth.', 'Access to professional development & coaching with additional free membership with Udemy, offering virtual learning via access to 4,000 courses', 'Ergonomic investment in your personal/home office while working virtually', 'At Fictiv, we’re inspired every day by our customers and teammates.', 'Bring out the best in the team', 'Happy hours and demo days to showcase what you’re working on and AMA’s from the Executive team!', 'Bring out the best in the team – You use influence and knowledge to lift the team to high standards of excellence not only in application design and code quality but also in collaboration and development practices.Technical expertise – You have extensive experience building performant, scalable web applications. You think deeply about how data is fetched, cached, and updated to provide a seamless user experience.Deliver quality – You have a high attention to detail and hold both yourself and your colleagues accountable for shipping polished, well-tested code.Team-oriented – You have a strong desire to help the entire team level up and improve our collective craft. You understand, as a leader, the outsized impact of your actions and behaviors.', 'Team-oriented – You have a strong desire to help the entire team level up and improve our collective craft. You understand, as a leader, the outsized impact of your actions and behaviors.', 'Deliver quality', 'We’re a small, close-knit team with a core group in San Francisco and a few remote engineers around the country. While all engineers need protected time to get things done, we also believe collaboration and creative tension create the best product. That’s why we encourage a rhythm of heads down, independent work followed by focused constructive debate.', 'Senior engineers are the heart of our engineering team at Fictiv.  As a Senior Engineer, you will be the hands-on technical anchor for your team. You will guide decisions from inside a project and lead us to build thoughtful, intuitive web applications with modular, well-structured components. You are a champion for the quality of our product, a key contributor to our architecture, and the go-to expert for upleveling the skills of our engineers.', 'We’re constantly evolving our practices, so please feel free to ask questions and share your thoughts as well!', 'Investment in Health & Wellness (we offer everything from virtual vinyasa to pilates classes)', 'Equal maternity & paternity leave', 'Senior engineers are the heart of our engineering team at Fictiv. ', 'Team-oriented', 'Community days where you contribute to your community and enrich both yourself and organizations of your choice. Each year, you can use up to two days as community days.', ' Desired traits ', 'About Fictiv ( www.fictiv.com ) ', 'For decades, these innovators have had to endure long feedback cycles and high upfront costs to bring their products to market. Our system drastically reduces the time and cost while allowing hardware engineers to experiment faster and with better outcomes. Come play a critical role in shaping this system into becoming the go-to platform for hardware development.', 'What’s In It For You ', 'We Offer Our Team Members The Following', 'Technical expertise – You have extensive experience building performant, scalable web applications. You think deeply about how data is fetched, cached, and updated to provide a seamless user experience.', 'Technical expertise', 'Since we are a small team, all engineers (including managers) are on-call for two weeks out of every 8-10 weeks. This builds team cohesion and deepens our understanding of our production system. We are all here to support one another, so if you have personal events during this time we’re happy to swap slots or cover for you.', 'At Fictiv, we help product innovators to create.']

['', 'Dedication to excellent communication across teams (QA, UX, Creative, Marketing and other Development teams); understanding of the greater impact your work has on peer teams', 'About Ramsey Solutions:', 'Experience with Agile product development\xa0(Scrum or Kanban preferred)', 'Eight out of 10 Americans live paycheck to paycheck, and more than 50% of Americans have less than $10,000 saved for retirement. Our goal is to cause so much disruption to the toxic money culture of this country that we’ll force the financial industry to shift its strategies and how it operates. We exist to provide biblically based, common-sense education and empowerment that give HOPE to everyone in every walk of life. For the past 30 years, we’ve helped millions claw their way out of debt and change their family trees. ['', 'Advanced experience in database monitoring, troubleshooting, performance tuning, and high availability strategies for SQL Server 2012, SQL Server 2014, SQL Server 2016 and SQL Server in Azure IaaS', 'The SQL Server Engineering team is seeking a highly qualified Senior SQL Server Database Engineer/Architect to support our Microsoft SQL Servers. The Engineer will be responsible for the implementation, configuration, maintenance, diagnosis and performance tuning of critical SQL Server database systems, to ensure the availability and consistent performance of our corporate applications. This is a "hands-on” position requiring solid technical skills, as well as excellent interpersonal and communication skills.The successful candidate will be responsible for triaging and optimizing application and platform related performance issues. The candidate will also be responsible for ensuring database systems and services are certified for operational readiness (desired state configuration, security, health and performance). The candidate must be a subject matter expert on SQL and must able to lead applications and projects independently.Lead performance monitoring and tuning of assigned projects and communicate with other teams for identifying root cause of all database related issues. Proactively support ongoing maintenance, backup/ recovery, security, auditing and production support.Configure and maintain database servers and processes, including monitoring of system health and performance, to ensure high levels of performance, availability, and security.Design, troubleshoot and optimize SSIS and ETL packages and SSRS reports to meet business needsIndependently analyze, solve, and correct issues in real time, providing problem resolution end-to-end.Assist developers with complex query tuning and schema refinement.Routinely evaluates/ implements improved methods or processes for administering and maintaining databases and servers.Perform scheduled maintenance and support release deployment activities after hours.Participate in design and architecture review of the databases and applications. Lead efforts with database topology review and communicate with multiple teams to finalize optimal design for databases and applications.Serve as escalation point for troubleshooting minor to major problems on an as-needed basis; often requiring time sensitive response and pro-active communication to different groups within the organization RequirementsContribute to the creation of processes, procedures and standards for SQL Server database administration that supports the use of optimal database server resources and performance to minimize potential downtime scenariosDefining requirements for automating routine database service delivery processes and collaborating with peers to develop and enhance existing database service delivery automation solutionsImplements and maintains automated database maintenance plans and backup routines using standard methodologies.Participate in the 24/7 rotational On-Call schedule.', 'Serve as escalation point for troubleshooting minor to major problems on an as-needed basis; often requiring time sensitive response and pro-active communication to different groups within the organization Requirements', 'Share new ideas with the team and be able to think on your feet and recommend solutions.', "8+ years of experience administering large databases in a high transaction, 24x7 Microsoft SQL Server database environment.Advanced skills in resolving database locking conflicts/blocking and resource utilization contentionAbility to work with database developers and engineers to analyze database performance and identify problems in areas such as: execution plans, index coverage, and SQL server statistics. Demonstrate ability to solve complex database administration problems.Advanced experience in database monitoring, troubleshooting, performance tuning, and high availability strategies for SQL Server 2012, SQL Server 2014, SQL Server 2016 and SQL Server in Azure IaaSA thorough understanding of Performance Monitoring, Tuning and Optimization, using native and third-party monitoring and troubleshooting tools like IDERA/Redgate/OMS MMA or Dynatrace is requiredAdvanced knowledge of SQL Server backup and recovery strategies. Experience defining hardware requirements and storage capacity planning for development, testing, QA and production for capacity planning and performanceAdvanced knowledge SQL Server Disaster Recovery (DR) options, AlwaysOn availability groups and experience administering Windows Server, including Active Directory, Failover clustering, database partitioning, security and encryptionIn depth experience supporting SSIS, SSRS, replication, database mirroring, SQL Reporting Services, DacPac, BacPac, IsPac concept and deployment/automation of database objects is requiredAdvanced PowerShell scripting experience with ability to write automated scripts and strong knowledge of system tables and DMV's is required.Must be self-motivated, able to work in a team oriented environment as well as possess the ability to organize, plan and lead projects independently. Share new ideas with the team and be able to think on your feet and recommend solutions.Ability to work in a fast-paced environment, rapidly develop proficiency in new skills with a strong work ethic and a professional demeanorMCDBA or MCSE: Data Platform Required with at least MCSA SQL Server 2012/2016\xa0", 'This is a "hands-on” position requiring solid technical skills, as well as excellent interpersonal and communication skills.', 'SQL Server Disaster Recovery (DR)', 'Implements and maintains automated database maintenance plans and backup routines using standard methodologies.', 'Defining requirements for automating routine database service delivery processes and collaborating with peers to develop and enhance existing database service delivery automation solutions', 'plans', 'SQL server statistics', 'Working experience with SQL Server on IAAS and Azure SQL DB is a plus', '8+ years of experience administering large databases in a high transaction, 24x7 Microsoft SQL Server database environment.', '\xa0Additional Skills:', 'SQL Server 2012, SQL Server 2014, SQL Server 2016', 'SSIS, SSRS', 'database monitoring', 'business', 'Knowledge of PowerShell for SQL is a plus', 'Demonstrate ability to solve complex database administration problems.', 'recovery', 'Good working knowledge of Networking concepts such as subnetting, telnetting, IPV4 routing protocols and overall network connectivity.', 'MCDBA', 'index', 'Experience working with data analytics teams and business intelligence tools especially PowerBi', 'Understanding of Virtual Server environments.', 'Senior SQL Server Database Engineer/Architect', 'PAAS', 'intelligence', 'PowerShell', 'Must be self-motivated, able to work in a team oriented environment as well as possess the ability to organize, plan and lead projects independently. Lead efforts with database topology review and communicate with multiple teams to finalize optimal design for databases and applications.', 'Experience working with Microsoft Azure IAAS and PAAS solutions. ', 'SQL Reporting Services', 'database administration', 'Daily Responsibilities:', 'strategies', 'coverage', 'scripting', 'Understanding and experience with SAN hardware and administration.', "Bachelor's or Master's Degree in Computer science or related field is strongly desired.Experience working with Microsoft Azure IAAS and PAAS solutions. You are perpetual student to all aspects of data engineering and methodologies, it is a passion of yours.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Relational database management system (RDBMS) concepts including scenario-based performance tuning (transaction control and exception handling, data integrity constraints, indexing, triggers, data types, transaction logging). Understanding of set oriented vs. sequential processing: 4+ years.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 JSON File Format', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0AWS Athena: 1+ years.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Development with in-memory cache data stores like Redis and Memcached.', 'Not Required but Nice to Have Technology Skills and Patterns', 'Background', 'Other Competencies and Characteristics', 'PySpark', 'Proven Data Engineering Patterns and Concepts with Minimum Years of Experience:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Procedural SQL (including set-oriented processing, table folding via normalization/de-normalization, exception handling and transaction control): 4+ years', 'Job Summary', 'Required Skills', 'Proven Technology Development with Minimum Years of Experience:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0You are constantly looking for a new and exciting challenge. ['', 'Build cool things – Build a scalable analytics solution, including data processing, storage, and serving large-scale data through batch and stream, analytics for both behavioral & ad revenue through digital & non-digital channels.', 'Innovate and inspire – Think of new ways to help make our data platform more scalable, resilient, and reliable and then work across our team to put your ideas into action.', 'Java Spring, Kubernetes, and graph design', 'Must have Cassandra and one of or both- Dynomo DB or Graph DataBase- these are must-haves.', 'Hours: ', 'Experience with an open source such as Spring, Hadoop, Spark, Kafka, Druid, Kubernetes.', 'Data modeling skills- must have- how do you layout tables and queries -very important to modeling.', '2+ years of development experience in in Key-Value store databases like DynamoDB, Cassandra, ScyllaDB, etc.', 'Cloud-First - Plenty of experience with developing and deploying in a cloud-native environment preferably AWS cloud', ' 2+ years of development experience in in Key-Value store databases like DynamoDB, Cassandra, ScyllaDB, etc. 2+ years of development experience in Graph Databases like AWS Neptune, Neo4J, JanusGraph etc. Have 4+ years of experience developing a data-driven application using a mix of languages (Java, Scala, Python, SQL etc.) and open-source frameworks to implement data ingest, processing,and analytics technologies. Data and API ninja –You are also very handy with big data frameworks such as Hadoop, Apache Spark, No-SQL systems such as Cassandra or DynamoDB, Streaming technologies such as Apache Kafka;  Understand reactive programming and dependency injection such as Spring to develop REST services. Have a technology toolbox – Hands-on experience with newer technologies relevant to the data space such as Spark, Airflow, Apache Druid, Snowflake (or any other OLAP databases). Cloud-First - Plenty of experience with developing and deploying in a cloud-native environment preferably AWS cloud ', 'Think at scale - Lead the transformation of a peta-byte scale batch-based processing platform to a near-real-time streaming platform using technologies such as Apache Kafka, Cassandra, Spark, and other open-source frameworks', 'Experience in working with Data Scientists to operationalize machine learning models.', 'Must Have Skill Sets', 'Have pride ', 'Interviews- 2 interviews- initial and then panel.', ' Prior experience building internet scale platforms – handling Petabyte scale data, operationalizing clusters with hundreds of compute nodes in the cloud environment. Experience in operationalizing Machine Learning workflows to scale will be a huge plus as well.
