['', 'Basic Qualifications (Full Stack Software Engineer):', 'Preferred Qualifications (Full Stack Software Engineer):', ' ', ' Primary Responsibilities (Software Engineer) include but are not limited to the following: ', '  ', 'ManpowerGroup is an Equal Opportunity Employer (EOE/AA)', "As a Software Engineer you will be helping with today's challenges, while preparing for tomorrows. You will be challenged daily on exciting large-scale projects with the latest technologies. You will be part of a team that has meaningful work and makes a difference for both domestic and international healthcare markets. If you have a strong technical background with the ability to efficiently solve challenging problems, you would be set up to be very successful in this position and have a positive impact quickly. Join US!  This position provides an opportunity to transition from other private, public, government or military environments.  Primary Responsibilities (Software Engineer) include but are not limited to the following:  Be an active member of an Agile team by participating in all phases of SDLC, including design, software development and code reviews Develop software components based on requirements, architecture and design specifications Work with fellow software engineers, software architects, quality (QA) engineers, full-stack developers, and other engineering/development team members to design and build required systems Ensure applications integrate with 3rd party vendor software required to deliver the required solutions to customers. Adhere to team design and coding procedures and standards Help resolve escalated customer support issues Actively participate in relevant corporate programs/initiatives, complies with professional and quality standards complies with corporate policies and procedures, and act in a manner consistent with values and ethical standards.  Basic Qualifications (Full Stack Software Engineer):  Possess a Bachelor's degree or higher (completed and verified prior to start) from an accredited university OR High School Diploma/GED or higher (completed and verified prior to start) from an accredited institution and a minimum of eleven (11) years of experience in software development in lieu of the bachelor's degree education requirement  Minimum of three (3) years of experience in Software development experience with one or more programming languages and frameworks, including but not limited to: C#, Angular, SQL, JavaScript, Python (course work and internship work included)  Preferred Qualifications (Full Stack Software Engineer):  Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Computer Science Engineering, or related discipline Experience developing and delivering commercial enterprise software Familiarity with continuous integration Solid understanding of software design principles and architectural patterns Experience working in an Agile environment with strong test automation and continuous deployment Ability to easily switch between multiple programming languages/frameworks (i.e. JavaScript, Angular, C++, C#, Java, Python, .Net, XML, XSLT, XPath, JSON, HTML5, etc.) Experience following disciplined development practices including version control tools (Git, GitHub, TFS), code reviews, and unit, integration, and automated testing. Experience with cloud architectures and development of large-scale hosted applications Interest and ability to learn other coding languages as needed. Ability to speak and write English fluently and idiomatically"]

The focus of this role includes using data to develop and deliver the information necessary for making business decisions and providing actionable intelligence that allows senior management to better manage the business.\xa0This person should be able to interpret data, analyzing results using various techniques and extracting information which can offer ways to improve products and business approaches thus influencing business decisions. This includes understanding and reviewing current processes and coordinating and collaborating across business and technology functions to ensure comprehensive solutions are delivered.\xa0\xa0\xa0The Financial Data Analyst acts in a lead role on projects, including communications with IT as well as key business stakeholders.\xa0You will provide the sales leaders data they need to guide the business from models built based on current statistics.', 'Requirements', "3-5 years using data to build models to provide to business leaders.\xa0Advanced knowledge/experience with BI/BW tools and data visualization tools such as Tableau, PowerBI, SQL, & Alteryx.Familiarity with statistical modeling techniquesFamiliarity with statistical and general programming languages such as R and/or Python\xa0\xa0Customer centric analysis, profitability analysis and modelingBachelor’s degree Required, Masters a plusBachelor's Degree with Finance, Economics, MIS, Information Systems or related quantitative discipline field of study required.\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Able to work independently with minimum supervision.\xa0\xa0\xa0Able to maintain confidentiality of sensitive information\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Prefer someone who lives in Tampa Bay areaNo 3rd\xa0parties, no sponsorship available", 'Advanced knowledge/experience with BI/BW tools and data visualization tools such as Tableau, PowerBI, SQL, & Alteryx.', 'Looking for a Data Scientist with financial data experience to join a great company in a full-time role with fantastic benefits!', 'Customer centric analysis, profitability analysis and modeling', 'Able to work independently with minimum supervision.\xa0\xa0\xa0']

This has included money for the home office, medical\xa0reimbursements, free Calm meditation/mindfulness\xa0app membership, Me Days and Summer Fridays where the whole team is off at once (so no one falls behind), and weekly wrap meetings to “end the week.”\xa0', 'We value:', 'There’s not a better time to join\xa0Thirty Madison, a fast-growing company with the simple belief that everyone deserves access to specialized healthcare treatment. ['', "About Cloudflare's Engineering Teams", 'Full Stack Engineer', 'Backend Engineer', "What you'll do", ' Talking about your work to technical and non-technical people ', '  Desire to learn and improve   Understanding of distributed systems   Talking about your work to technical and non-technical people   Working as part of an agile software development team   Understand how the internet works at a protocol level   Good unix knowledge, patches to Operating Systems a huge plus for some roles   Understanding of security issues and responsibilities   Experience of debugging and testing   Analysing data sets such as logs   Designing and building APIs  ', ' Working as part of an agile software development team ', ' Athenian Project :', 'About Us', ' Good unix knowledge, patches to Operating Systems a huge plus for some roles ', ' Desire to learn and improve ', ' Designing and building APIs ', 'Path Forward Partnership', 'Project Galileo', 'Examples Of Desirable Skills And Experience', 'What Makes Cloudflare Special?', ' Analysing data sets such as logs ', " To deliver that, we built one of the world's largest networks. Every day, we see more than 1 billion unique IP addresses. Anytime we push code, it automatically affects the 25 million+ Internet properties (websites, apps, APIs, etc.) running on our global network. Cloudflare's network is one of the largest in the world and spans over 200 cities in more than 100 countries. What's more, Cloudflare operates within 100 milliseconds of 99% of the Internet-connected population in the developed world (for context, the blink of an eye is 300-400 milliseconds!). We are passionate about making the Internet more secure, reliable, and faster for everyone. ", 'Frontend Engineer', " Cloudflare helps build the future of the Internet. We started Cloudflare to solve one half of every IT organization's challenge: how do you ensure the resources and infrastructure that you expose to the Internet are safe from attack, fast, and reliable. We saw that the world was moving away from hardware and software to solve these problems and instead wanted a scalable service that would work around the world. ", ' Understanding of security issues and responsibilities ', '1.1.1.1', ' Experience of debugging and testing ', ' Understand how the internet works at a protocol level ', ' Understanding of distributed systems ']

['', 'Disclaimer: This is a full-time remote position, headquartered out of Columbus, OH. We are open to assisting with relocation and willing to discuss U.S. remote for the right candidate. Visa Sponsorship is not included in our hiring package. Applicants will need to be authorized to work in the U.S.', 'The Opportunity', 'The Software Engineer role will be a part of a lean, nimble, full stack powerful engineering team. We value simplicity in both our code and our UI. We don’t believe in bloated teams or overly architected solutions; we opt for small, nimble players that work well together, iterates fast and achieves more as a high-powered team. Since we’re a small team, you’ll have the opportunity to work on virtually all aspects of the software and have a direct and immediate impact! This role will advance our cutting-edge data search engine and social profiling platform. The role will build scalable backend microservices, APIs and database structures using Node / Express / Postgres, etc. We have a service-oriented architecture,\xa0two client facing platforms, a web app, and a Chrome extension supported by around 9 other services (with an internal API to connect them). You will be at the core of every new feature, every product decision, and every touch point of our users. You will not be micromanaged and have full autonomy to design the architecture and engineer the features / products for scale. If you are a problem solver and enjoy having the ability to think creatively with your code, you would love being on this team.\xa0', 'No Recruiters. This is an internal position our internal team is hiring for.', 'Design, Development, and implementation of scalable and performant Microservices handling large quantities of concurrent requests and data (initially this role will be responsible for frontend development but will also require backend, full stack).', 'Experience with new React features such as Hooks is a plus.', 'Creating JSON schemas and UX workflows that represent and support business processes to support hundreds of millions of records.', 'Any UI/UX design experience is a plus.', 'Ideally 5+ years experience building high-quality products.Expert knowledge of modern frontend technologies such as React, ES6/7 JavaScript, Webpack, HTML, and CSS.Creating comprehensible documentation for new and existing features and functionalities.Experience interacting with internal APIs, and integrating with 3rd party APIs.Any UI/UX design experience is a plus.Experience developing Chrome extensions a plus.Experience with new React features such as Hooks is a plus.', 'An ability to think through customer requirements and quickly solve their problems.\xa0', 'Creating full features, relatively unsupervised - including strong communication with the remote team.', 'We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.', 'Regularly (and often frequently) shipping quality finished code - working in an AGILE/MVP format is key.', 'Seamless delivers the world’s best sales leads. Through our product, we help sales teams maximize revenue, increase sales, and easily acquire their total addressable market using artificial intelligence. We have been recognized as one of Ohio’s fastest growing companies and just won an award for Best Technology Company of the year in 2019 by NJTC.\xa0', 'We have an amazing culture and work environment that anyone would want to be a part of. We encourage a culture of positivity. We thrive off of continuous feedback and do whatever it takes to help our team and customers be successful. You will grow as an individual, professionally, and be able to see and feel the impact you are making to the growth of Seamless every day.', 'An interest in building UIs with modern tools like React, ES6, Styled Components, and Webpack.Design, Development, and implementation of scalable and performant Microservices handling large quantities of concurrent requests and data (initially this role will be responsible for frontend development but will also require backend, full stack).Creating JSON schemas and UX workflows that represent and support business processes to support hundreds of millions of records.An ability to think through customer requirements and quickly solve their problems.\xa0Regularly (and often frequently) shipping quality finished code - working in an AGILE/MVP format is key.Creating full features, relatively unsupervised - including strong communication with the remote team.Supporting applications across multiple platforms such as browsers extension, mobile, and web applications.', 'Ideally 5+ years experience building high-quality products.', 'About Seamless', 'Qualifications: ', '\xa0', 'Experience developing Chrome extensions a plus.', 'The Seamless Family', 'Supporting applications across multiple platforms such as browsers extension, mobile, and web applications.', 'Expert knowledge of modern frontend technologies such as React, ES6/7 JavaScript, Webpack, HTML, and CSS.', 'Creating comprehensible documentation for new and existing features and functionalities.', 'An interest in building UIs with modern tools like React, ES6, Styled Components, and Webpack.', 'The Skill Set:', 'Experience interacting with internal APIs, and integrating with 3rd party APIs.']

['', 'Experience with Lucene-based Search engines like Solr or Elasticsearch is a plus', 'Ability to maintain a stable application infrastructure with appropriate metrics, logging and CI/CD pipelines', 'Develop and improve relevance in our primary product search indexes based in Elastic & Solr by partnering with Data Science, Merchandising and other teams to provide relevant results to customers.', 'Ability to work creatively and problem solve independently', 'Experience using Docker, Kubernetes or other containerization technologies is a plus', 'A continuous drive to explore, enhance, automate and optimize distributed systems', 'Senior Software Engineer, Search Technologies ', 'Search Technologies', 'About Us', 'Experience building high performance, scalable and fault-tolerant Java applications preferred', 'Work collaboratively with partnering teams to create Java APIs for customer applications to enable fast retrieval of product & text data.', 'What You’ll Do', 'Good understanding of SRE/devops and experience in cloud-computing technologies and puppet is a plus.', 'Who We Are', 'Experience in Information Retrieval, Natural Language Processing is a plus', 'Create Big Data and Machine Learning pipelines to augment and enhance search experience by providing search suggestions, allowing for expanded personalization, and enriching search relevance.', 'Expertise in algorithms and data structures', ' Work collaboratively with partnering teams to create Java APIs for customer applications to enable fast retrieval of product & text data. Construct abstraction layers/services over lucene-based and other ML-based systems that power retrieval of product data, search suggestions or other classification data and power personalization of results for individual customers at scale. Create event stream producers and consumers to enable fast, modular transfer of data such as inventory, prices, sale events, etc between large applications throughout the company and hydrate search indexes with searchable product data.  Build and enhance software to maintain our search infrastructure, with disaster recovery, multi-datacenter support, multi-layer caching, failover capabilities, and a customized deployment process. Create containerized search applications in docker/kubernetes to be leveraged by Search Technologies peers, as well as all engineering teams at Wayfair looking to utilize text-search and fast filtering capabilities Develop and improve relevance in our primary product search indexes based in Elastic & Solr by partnering with Data Science, Merchandising and other teams to provide relevant results to customers. Create Big Data and Machine Learning pipelines to augment and enhance search experience by providing search suggestions, allowing for expanded personalization, and enriching search relevance. ', 'A graduate of a computer science, mathematics, engineering, physical science related degree program with 5+ years of relevant industry experience, OR have 7+ years of relevant industry experience', 'Experience with large-scale data processing and design of distributed systems.', 'Construct abstraction layers/services over lucene-based and other ML-based systems that power retrieval of product data, search suggestions or other classification data and power personalization of results for individual customers at scale.', 'Create event stream producers and consumers to enable fast, modular transfer of data such as inventory, prices, sale events, etc between large applications throughout the company and hydrate search indexes with searchable product data. ', '4+ years of Java experience experience or 5+ years experience in other OOP-based programming languages', 'What You’ll Need', 'Comfortable working in a collaborative, fast-paced and dynamic work environment', ' A graduate of a computer science, mathematics, engineering, physical science related degree program with 5+ years of relevant industry experience, OR have 7+ years of relevant industry experience 4+ years of Java experience experience or 5+ years experience in other OOP-based programming languages Experience building high performance, scalable and fault-tolerant Java applications preferred Experience with Service-Oriented architecture (REST & GraphQL) and ability to architect scalable microservices Experience with Lucene-based Search engines like Solr or Elasticsearch is a plus Experience using Docker, Kubernetes or other containerization technologies is a plus Expertise in algorithms and data structures Ability to maintain a stable application infrastructure with appropriate metrics, logging and CI/CD pipelines Experience with streaming technologies like Spark, Storm, Kafka, etc are a plus Experience in Information Retrieval, Natural Language Processing is a plus Good understanding of SRE/devops and experience in cloud-computing technologies and puppet is a plus. A continuous drive to explore, enhance, automate and optimize distributed systems Ability to work creatively and problem solve independently Comfortable working in a collaborative, fast-paced and dynamic work environment Experience with large-scale data processing and design of distributed systems. ', 'Create containerized search applications in docker/kubernetes to be leveraged by Search Technologies peers, as well as all engineering teams at Wayfair looking to utilize text-search and fast filtering capabilities', 'Experience with streaming technologies like Spark, Storm, Kafka, etc are a plus', 'Experience with Service-Oriented architecture (REST & GraphQL) and ability to architect scalable microservices', 'Build and enhance software to maintain our search infrastructure, with disaster recovery, multi-datacenter support, multi-layer caching, failover capabilities, and a customized deployment process.']

['', 'Data processing platforms such as Spark, Hadoop, etc.', 'We are looking for an experienced Data Engineer on the Healthcare Map / Data Platform team to play a key role in enabling Komodo scalability. In this role, you will have the opportunity to help solve complex challenges and be a part of a great team. Our engineering team is currently about 90 and growing rapidly. You will be able to use one of the biggest, most complete healthcare datasets to solve real world problems that deliver value to clients and positive impact on the world.\xa0Some of the tools we use are: Python, Snowflake, Airflow, AWS EMR, AWS Lambda, Spark, AWS EKS, and Docker.', 'As one of the members of this business-critical team, you will:', 'Basic knowledge (college level or hands on) of machine learning and statistics.', 'Help operate existing data sources', 'Ability to work as part of a collaborative team in a fast-paced environment.', 'We Breathe Life Into Data', 'Nice to have:', 'Pipeline scheduling and monitoring systems, like Airflow or Luigi', 'You are an experienced technologist who has a proven track record of designing and building large scale solutions using big data technologies, ideally using Spark, Airflow and Python.\xa0', 'Help architect and implement new data ingestion framework', 'Python development', 'Create automation systems and tools to configure, monitor, and orchestrate the data services and data pipelines.', 'What you bring to Komodo Health:\xa0', 'The Opportunity at Komodo Health', 'At Komodo Health, our mission is to reduce the global burden of disease. Smarter use of data is essential to this mission. We combine the world’s most comprehensive view of patient encounters with innovative algorithms and decades of clinical expertise to power our Healthcare Map, the industry’s most precise view of the U.S. healthcare system. With the Healthcare Map as our foundation, we offer a suite of powerful software applications that deliver exceptional value to the industry.', 'BS/MS in Computer Science, related degrees or relevant technical experience.5-7+ years implementing data engineering and distributed systems.\xa0Building and deploying large-scale, complex data services and data pipelines.Python developmentPipeline scheduling and monitoring systems, like Airflow or LuigiData processing platforms such as Spark, Hadoop, etc.Ability to work as part of a collaborative team in a fast-paced environment.Sincere interest in working at a healthcare startup and passion for healthcare data.', 'Write code to ingest new data sources at high scale', 'Our people are the center of our success. We are a smart, supportive team with diverse perspectives and a shared passion for fixing what’s broken in healthcare. It’s fun, challenging and important. Join us!', 'Building and deploying large-scale, complex data services and data pipelines.', '5-7+ years implementing data engineering and distributed systems.\xa0', 'Sincere interest in working at a healthcare startup and passion for healthcare data.', 'BS/MS in Computer Science, related degrees or relevant technical experience.', 'Help architect and implement new data ingestion frameworkWrite code to ingest new data sources at high scaleHelp operate existing data sources', 'Design, develop, and implement distributed data systems using Spark or similar technologies to ingest incoming data at scale.\xa0', 'After three months, you will:\xa0', 'Evaluate new technologies for continuous improvements in Data Engineering.', 'Collaborate with data scientists to implement validation and/or data quality enhancements.', 'Design, develop, and implement distributed data systems using Spark or similar technologies to ingest incoming data at scale.\xa0Create automation systems and tools to configure, monitor, and orchestrate the data services and data pipelines.Evaluate new technologies for continuous improvements in Data Engineering.Collaborate with data scientists to implement validation and/or data quality enhancements.']

['', 'Generate descriptive visualizations and presentations to communicate insights.', 'Drive A/B & multivariate tests and design of experiments to facilitate testing of new product and design features, with focus on improving engagement, retention, and conversion.', 'What will you bring?', 'Working experience with relational databases (SQL) and large scale distributed systems.', 'Perform exploratory analysis on realtor.com’s wealth of data including consumer web and mobile behavior and North America’s most comprehensive and up-to-date listings and properties data set.', 'What will you do?', 'Proven track record of developing online data products.', ' Develop predictive, explanatory models and machine learning algorithms. Create automated learning systems that gracefully scale to increasing complexity and expectation. Perform exploratory analysis on realtor.com’s wealth of data including consumer web and mobile behavior and North America’s most comprehensive and up-to-date listings and properties data set. Effectively partner with product and engineering teams to build new data driven and machine learning based features for enriching the consumer experience of home shoppers, renters and sellers. Design and build data science solutions to drive revenue growth, customer retention and support strategic decision making. Generate descriptive visualizations and presentations to communicate insights. Drive A/B & multivariate tests and design of experiments to facilitate testing of new product and design features, with focus on improving engagement, retention, and conversion. Help improve the scope of our data sets by identifying new data collection and procurement opportunities on an ongoing basis. Mentor a team of data scientists on data exploration, machine learning and developing data-oriented products. Work with a sense of ownership and urgency, advocate for experimentation based, agile culture. ', 'Develop predictive, explanatory models and machine learning algorithms.', 'PhD/MS in computer science, statistics, mathematics, operations research or related fields.', ' PhD/MS in computer science, statistics, mathematics, operations research or related fields. 4+ years of relevant experience in data science, machine learning or applied statistics. Experience with Machine Learning, NLP or Computer Vision and data mining tools and underlying algorithms. Experienced in Python, R, Spark or other languages and frameworks appropriate for large scale analysis of structured and unstructured data.
